mapper.insert: insert into news_approve_contribution (ID, CONTRIBUTION_ID, APPROVER_ID, OPERATION, DISABLED, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, SUGGESTION) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{contributionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{approverId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{operation,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{disabled,jdbcType=BIT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{suggestion,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.select: select ID, CONTRIBUTION_ID, APPROVER_ID, OPERATION, DISABLED, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, SUGGESTION from news_approve_contribution
